mapper.select: select count(*) from( select a.in_out_code from stock_in_out a where a.clinic_id = #{clinic} and (a.type='进货' or a.type='退货') and a.order_id = #{code} and date_format(a.in_out_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{time} and a.type = #{type}) t
select * from stock_in_out where in_out_code = #{code} and clinic_id = #{clinic}

select b.in_out_id,b.in_out_code,b.in_out_time,b.type,b.creator_id,b.creator,b.num,b.money,b.clinic_id,b.org_name,c.user_name,c.audit_time,c.remark ,case when b.state = 0.5 then '已发送' when c.is_pass is null then '未审核' end state from ( select t.* from ( select a.in_out_id,a.in_out_code,a.in_out_time,a.type,a.creator_id,a.creator,a.num,a.money,a.state,a.clinic_id,b.org_name from stock_in_out a,sec_org b where a.clinic_id = b.id_ and a.type != '领用' and a.type != '退领' order by a.state,a.in_out_time desc) t ) b left join stock_audit c on b.in_out_id = c.in_out_id where c.is_pass is null or b.state = 0.5 order by b.in_out_time desc,b.state
